amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of Federal regulations regarding the requirements for employment incentives and relocation expenses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of sections 575.106 or 575.206 of title 5, Code of Federal Regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
